Peach suggests the cards be read in the following order: 1+2, 3+4, 7+8, 5+6, 9+10 Note that 'helpful' and 'adverse' influences are always with respect to the outcome shown in card 2. Thus if the answer comes up no, cards 3 and 4 will be aiding that outcome and not necessarily aiding the querent. Since Peach says that card If card 2 is upright, the answer to the question was yes; if reversed, no, then you probably should enable "allow reversed cards"
If upright, the answer to the question was yes; if reversed, no. Also the outcome card for the reading.
Things that are working against the outcome
Things that are working against the outcome
